attributes.action: change the way PIP is assessed. The assessment is nothing short of criminal
attributes.additional_details: Many of my friends have now become housebound due to their higher rate of mobility being removed and their vehicles being taken from them, which all have relied on for many years to enable to go out without pain and discomfort. These assessors appear to be little qualified to assess medical conditions in the first place. How could they possibly know the level of pain and discomfort involved
attributes.background:
I myself have been a victim of the disgraceful way we are assessed
Both of my sisters in laws also and many many friends and associates lives have been totally turned upside down by these unfair decisions being made. How dare these people call us LIARS! about our conditions.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition explaining what specific change you would like to the way PIP is assessed.
